values: 捕捉；抓住；握住；截获；截住；逮捕；捕获；赶上（交通工具）；及时参与；出席；参加；吸引（注意力、兴趣）；引起；激发（兴趣、情感、想像、注意等）；感染（疾病）；被（机器、门等）卡住；夹住；钩住；绊住；意外地被缠住；理解；听到；听清楚；领会；注意到；（ 偶然或突然地）撞见；察觉；当场发现；当场发觉；发现；看见；瞥见；遭遇；遇到（困难、问题等）；遭受（处罚等）；欺骗；接（落下的液体）；（在球落地前）接住球；击中；打；（光）照射；使进退两难；突然制止；逼真再现；及时做；及时谈
捕捉；捕获；总捕获量；捕获物；困境；难题；陷阱；圈套；诡计；潜在问题；隐患；门闩；门扣；（ 歌曲等的 ）片段；轮唱曲段；（体育运动中的）接球；传接球游戏；（机械装置的）固定部件；扣拴物；扣件

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 引人注意的；容易记住的；易使人上当的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指根据法律或命令进行逮捕并予以监禁或拘留。
侧重指以突然、有力地动作迅速抓住或捉住。
普通用词，指捉住跑动或隐藏中的人或动物，一般指活捉。
指通过武力或计谋等，战胜抵抗而捉住敌人或动物。

word_group.brief_definition: 追上；赶上；与（有段时间未曾相见的人）交谈；开始产生破坏性影响
开始燃烧, 着火；吸引人, 引起人们的兴趣, 激动人心
赶上, 追赶；弥补；听消息

word_group.phrase: The early bird catches the worm.

word_group.brief_definition: 慢慢理解, 开始流行
受凉；感冒；伤风；遇到麻烦
引起某人的注意；引人瞩目
追赶, 赶上, 追上；了解/讨论最新情况
赶上它, 接住它, 捉住它；受罚, 受斥责

bilingual.source: They'll catch up in a few minutes.
bilingual.target: 他们几分钟后会赶上来。

bilingual.source: She runs quickly to catch the bus.
bilingual.target: 她为了赶上公交车而奔跑。

bilingual.source: Come on, we need to catch that bus.
bilingual.target: 快点，我们得赶上那班车。

bilingual.source: He rushed to catch the last train.
bilingual.target: 他匆忙赶上了最后一班火车。

bilingual.source: The driver speeded to catch the green light.
The kids were rushing to catch the school bus.
We need to double to catch the train.
bilingual.target: 我们得快步走才能赶上火车。

bilingual.source: She trot all the way to catch the bus.
bilingual.target: 她为了赶上公交车一路小跑。

bilingual.source: I need to speed up to catch up with him.
bilingual.target: 我必须加快速度才能赶上他。

list.abstract: catch，英文单词，抓住、看见的意思。

Catch是让每个人都能拍出文艺范儿大片的短视频社区应用，是一个有文化有内涵的圈层聚集地。有了Catch，从此没有抓拍不到的瞬间，视频也不再只是一 种拍摄形式，而是如电影镜头般去记录生活，讲述故事。 Catch让我们不再只关注自己，而是将镜头更多面向丰富多彩的世界。 Catch这款APP带来了短视频应用的一次变革，代表着全新的生活记录方式。 三张照片抓拍精彩瞬间，可控的压缩镜头带来震撼的大片即视感，灵动的标签赋予视频更多意义，也改变了以往只能在视频外解说的方式，用你的角度分享世界。

yingyinNormal.en: You gotta hurry if you wanna catch that bot fight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想赶上那场比赛的话，你最好快点。

yingyinNormal.en: The Train. Of course. That is so much faster. But how do we catch it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 火车，对啊，火车快多了，但我们怎么赶上火车。

yingyinNormal.en: Catch the ball, George. Catch, George. George, catch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接住球，乔治。接住，乔治。乔治，接住。

yingyinNormal.en: You want to catch me up?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能告诉我怎么了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: They were trying to catch me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们是想要抓住我。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, go on ahead. I'll catch up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们先走一步，我马上就来。

yingyinNormal.en: You catch this, Potter, and we win.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你一抓到它，波特，比赛就结束。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, you want to catch me up again?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，你愿意再提示我一下么？

yingyinNormal.en: So there is a catch. No, an opportunity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你是有目的的了。不，是机遇。

yingyinNormal.en: George, you're the piggy. George. Catch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治，你来做中间的小猪。乔治，接住咯。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, gosh, we have so much to catch up on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，天呐！我们有太多的事情要分享了！

yingyinNormal.en: You tricky rainbow. Quick. Let's catch it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是调皮的彩虹。快！我们去追它。

yingyinNormal.en: Just go. I'll catch up with you. All right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们先去吧，我等下就去找你们。好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, we saw them. Can we go catch the movie?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，我们看见他们了，我们可以去看电影了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: But, it's not raining. I can't catch a break.
yingyinNormal.zh: 外面没下雨。我的运气真不好。

yingyinNormal.en: Can't catch me. This is the best Christmas ever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你抓不到我！这是最棒的圣诞节！

yingyinNormal.en: No more than usual. How'd you catch him? I didn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 和平常没什么两样，你们怎么抓住他的？不是我。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't worry George! Daddy Pig will catch your hat!
yingyinNormal.zh: 别着急，乔治！猪爸爸会追上你的帽子的！

yingyinNormal.en: No, he isn't, Daddy, watch. Catch it, George. Hurray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是的，爸爸，你看好啦。接住，乔治。好诶。

yingyinNormal.en: He's responsible for Tadashi. We gotta catch that guy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是他害死了阿正，我们要抓住那家伙。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 追上；赶上；交谈；开始产生破坏性影响

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: succeed in reaching a person who is ahead of one

examination_example.sentence: Students without experience can <highlight>catch</highlight> up after a few introductory courses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有经验的学生可以在几门入门课程后迎头赶上。

examination_example.sentence: And for women who work outside the home, they often are playing <highlight>catch</highlight>-up-with-household tasks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而对于在外工作的女性来说，她们总是忙着处理家务活。

examination_example.sentence: Those from elite universities <highlight>catch</highlight> up fairly quickly to where they otherwise would have been.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些从精英大学毕业的学生很快就能赶上他们原本的水平。

sense_info_list.en: you capture them after chasing them, or by using a trap, net, or other device.

examination_example.sentence: If you see a conversation as a fight, you can win by cheating as long as you don't get <highlight>caught</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你把一次谈话看作是一场战斗，只要你不被抓住，你就可以通过欺骗取胜。

examination_example.sentence: It gives us patience for ourselves while driving, <highlight>catching</highlight> a fish, working on our car, or raising a child.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它让我们在开车、捕鱼、修车或抚养孩子时保持耐心。

sense_info_list.en: engage (a person's interest or imagination)

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Caught</highlight> the attention of critics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 引起了评论家的注意。

examination_example.sentence: It can <highlight>catch</highlight> someone's attention in a crowded room.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以在拥挤的房间里吸引某人的注意力。

sense_info_list.en: reach in time and board (a train, bus, or aircraft)

examination_example.sentence: This is how far in advance authorities are recommending people show up to <highlight>catch</highlight> a domestic flight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是当局建议人们赶国内航班需要提前的时间。

examination_example.sentence: You can be easily <highlight>caught</highlight> up by life problems that you forget to pause and appreciate the things you have.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你很容易遭遇生活中的问题，以至于忘记停下来欣赏你所拥有的东西。

sense_info_list.en: come upon (someone) unexpectedly
sense_info_list.zh: 发现; 撞见; 遇上

examination_example.sentence: Yet two years before Dicken's birth, his mother's father was <highlight>caught</highlight> stealing and fled to Europe, never to return.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，在狄更斯出生前两年，他母亲的父亲被发现偷窃，逃到欧洲，再也没有回来。

sense_info_list.en: become ignited, due to contact with flame, and start burning
sense_info_list.zh: 起火; 着火; (引擎)点火

sense_info_list.en: intercept and hold (something which has been thrown, propelled, or dropped); grasp
sense_info_list.zh: 接住; 截住; (catch at)试图抓住

sense_info_list.en: get an illness, especially one caused by bacteria or a virus
reach or be in a place in time to see (a person, performance, programme, etc.)
strike (someone) on a part of the body
accidentally become entangled or trapped in sth.; fix or fasten in place
sense_info_list.zh: 被卡住/绊住; 固定; 系牢

sense_info_list.en: a concealed difficulty or complication
perceive fleetingly
hear or understand (something said), especially with effort
sense_info_list.zh: 听见; 听清楚; 理解
传球游戏; 捉人游戏

word_usage.usage: catch up with sb.既可以表示“追上、赶上某人”，也可以表示“惹上麻烦、产生坏影响”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 引起; 激发(兴趣/想象/注意等)

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 开始燃烧；着火；吸引人；引起人们的兴趣；激动人心
追赶；赶上；追上；了解/讨论最新情况

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 捕捉者；抓取者；捕捉器；接球手

word_family.mean: v. 截住；拿住；捕获；意外地被缠住；赶上；吸引；激发；击打；感染；起火；着火

sense_info_list.en: manage to be in time to see or do something

examination_example.sentence: Transport planners have yet to <highlight>catch</highlight> up with this trend, instead laying new roads to tackle traffic jams.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 交通规划者尚未赶上这一趋势，而是选择铺设新路来解决交通拥堵问题。

sense_info_list.en: get an illness, especially one caused by bacteria or a virus

examination_example.sentence: If the wooden frame of the towers had <highlight>caught</highlight> fire, it could have sent the bell crashing down, potentially causing the collapse of both towers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果双塔的木制框架着火，钟可能会倒塌，可能会导致双塔倒塌。

examination_example.sentence: There was shock and tears as the cathedral spire <highlight>caught</highlight> fire, burned and then collapsed into itself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当大教堂的尖顶着火，燃烧，然后倒塌时，人们震惊，流泪。

sense_info_list.zh: 引起; 激发(兴趣/想象/注意等)

examination_example.sentence: One should think twice upon reading online comments and information, as they may be groundless and fictitious just to <highlight>catch</highlight> people's attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个人在阅读网上的评论和信息时应该三思，因为它们可能是毫无根据和虚构的，只是为了引起人们的注意。

sense_info_list.en: discover, see, or realize something, especially someone doing something wrong
take hold of something, especially something that is moving through the air

examination_example.sentence: News of the Notre Dame Cathedral catastrophe instantly <highlight>caught</highlight> media attention throughout the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴黎圣母院惨案的消息立即引起了全世界媒体的关注。

examination_example.sentence: She was <highlight>caught</highlight> in a hurricane.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她被卷入一场飓风中。

sense_info_list.en: stick somewhere, or to make something stick somewhere

word_usage.usage:
catch是非延续性动词，不能与表示一段时间的状语连用。
误 He has caught a cold for three days.
正 He caught a cold three days ago.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指根据法律或命令进行逮捕并予以监禁或拘留。
指通过武力或计谋等, 战胜抵抗而捉住敌人或动物。
普通用词, 指捉住跑动或隐藏中的人或动物, 一般指活捉。
指用手紧握或用臂紧抱。
强调匆忙、紧急地抓、抓紧。
指紧紧抓住、抓牢。从本义抓紧、抓住, 引申作"理解、掌握"。
语气比 grasp 强, 指用手的最大力量紧紧抓住。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 捕捉者；抓取者；捕捉器；接球手

word_family.mean: v. 截住；拿住；捕获；意外地被缠住；赶上；吸引；激发；击打；感染；起火；着火

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 追上；赶上；与(有段时间未曾相见的人)交谈；开始产生破坏性影响
开始燃烧；着火；吸引人；引起人们的兴趣；激动人心

sense_info_list.en: take hold of something; especially something that is moving through the air

examination_example.sentence: Days fare the deadly 2017 wildfires in Santa Rosa, Californian, a drone (无人机) <highlight>caught</highlight> footage (连续镜头) of a USPS worker, Trevor Smith, driving through boomed homes in that familiar white van, collecting mail in an affected area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在加州圣罗莎市2017年那场致命的野火发生后的几天，一架无人机捕捉到了美国邮政局工作人员特雷弗·史密斯驾驶着那辆熟悉的白色面包车穿过熙熙攘攘的住宅区，在受灾地区收集邮件的镜头。

sense_info_list.en: get an illness; especially one caused by bacteria or a virus

examination_example.sentence: Only people who were seated in the same row as a passenger with the flu — or one row in front of or behind that individual 一 had a high risk of <highlight>catching</highlight> the illness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有与患流感的乘客同坐一排，或者坐在患者前面或后面一排的人才会有较高的感染疾病的风险。

examination_example.sentence: Therefore, these new findings should help airplane passengers to feel less vulnerable to <highlight>catching</highlight> respiratory infections while traveling by air.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，这些新的发现应该有助于减轻乘客对搭机旅行过程中易患呼吸道感染的忧虑。

sense_info_list.en: manage to be in time to see or do something
discover; see; or realize something; especially someone doing something wrong

examination_example.sentence: To impose a penalty on anyone <highlight>caught</highlight> littering.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 处罚乱扔垃圾的人。

examination_example.sentence: They did not <highlight>catch</highlight> public attention in the United States until the 1990s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到20世纪90年代，它们才引起了美国公众的注意。

examination_example.sentence: What is <highlight>catching</highlight> environmentalists' attention nowadays?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是什么引起了当今环境保护主义者的注意？

sense_info_list.en: travel or be able to travel on an aircraft; train; bus; or others

word_usage.usage:
catch是非延续性动词，不能与表示一段时间的状语连用。
误 He has caught a cold for three days.
正 He caught a cold three days ago.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指根据法律或命令进行逮捕并予以监禁或拘留。
指通过武力或计谋等，战胜抵抗而捉住敌人或动物。
普通用词，指捉住跑动或隐藏中的人或动物，一般指活捉。
指用手紧握或用臂紧抱。
强调匆忙、紧急地抓、抓紧。
指紧紧抓住、抓牢。从本义抓紧、抓住，引申作"理解、掌握"。
语气比 grasp 强，指用手的最大力量紧紧抓住。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 追上；赶上；与(有段时间未曾相见的人)交谈；开始产生破坏性影响

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 捕捉者；抓取者；捕捉器；接球手

word_family.mean: v. 截住；拿住；捕获；意外地被缠住；赶上；吸引；激发；击打；感染；起火；着火

sense_info_list.zh: 接住; 捉住; 赶上

examination_example.sentence: But soon I <highlight>caught</highlight> a few of his glances.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但很快我捕捉到了他的几个眼神。

examination_example.sentence: I ran desperately but failed to <highlight>catch</highlight> up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我拼命跑，但没能追上。

examination_example.sentence: Fourteen wolves were <highlight>caught</highlight> in Canada and transported to the park.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 14只狼在加拿大被捕获，并被送往公园。

examination_example.sentence: The idea is <highlight>catching</highlight> on quickly There are now over 40 chat benches throughout England.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个想法很快流行起来，现在全英国有超过40个聊天室。

examination_example.sentence: The day itself is on October 21, but since it has <highlight>caught</highlight> on, events now spread out over most of October around Britain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一天原本定在10月21日，但自从它流行起来后，这一天的活动在10月的大部分时间里都在英国各地展开。

examination_example.sentence: Cafes focused around psychology, history, and engineering are <highlight>catching</highlight> on, filling tables well into the evening.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 专注于心理学、历史学和工程学的咖啡馆正在流行起来，桌子上一直到晚上都挤满了顾客。

examination_example.sentence: The phrase "penny paper " <highlight>caught</highlight> the public's fancy, and soon there would be papers that did indeed sell for only a penny.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “便士纸”这个短语引起了公众的兴趣，不久就会有真正只卖一便士的报纸出现了。

examination_example.sentence: Scott's last journey <highlight>caught</highlight> the world's imagination, and a film made in his honor drew crowds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 斯科特的最后一次旅程吸引了全世界的目光，一部以他的名字命名的电影吸引了大批观众。

examination_example.sentence: I had one trip last year where I was <highlight>caught</highlight> by a hurricane in America.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我去年有一次旅行，在美国遭遇了飓风。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 追上；赶上；与...交谈；开始产生破坏性影响
着火；引起兴趣；激动人心

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: The early bird catches the worm.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 受凉；感冒；伤风；遇到麻烦
引起某人的注意；引人瞩目

examination_example.sentence: Roger <highlight>caught</highlight> hold of the driver.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 罗杰抓住了司机。

examination_example.sentence: As the saying goes, "The early bird <highlight>catches</highlight> the worm."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 俗话说，“早起的鸟儿有虫吃。”

examination_example.sentence: It took him a few minutes before Crow saw Deer <highlight>caught</highlight> in a trap (陷阱) made of ropes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过了几分钟，乌鸦才看到鹿被绳子做成的陷阱困住了。

sense_info_list.en: engage (a person's interest or imagination)

examination_example.sentence: Suddenly, a few small colorful stones <highlight>caught</highlight> his eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 突然，几块彩色的小石头吸引了他的目光。

examination_example.sentence: Storytelling has <highlight>caught</highlight> the human imagination for thousands of years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几千年以来，故事叙述吸引着人类的注意力。

examination_example.sentence: The nurse's action <highlight>caught</highlight> the attention of the doctor on duty that day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 护士的举动引起了当天值班医生的注意。

sense_info_list.en: succeed in reaching a person who is ahead of one

examination_example.sentence: So I can't <highlight>catch</highlight> up with my classmates now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以我现在赶不上同学了。

examination_example.sentence: The boy fell behind, so he had to run to <highlight>catch</highlight> up with his father.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 男孩掉队了，所以他不得不跑着去追上他的父亲。

examination_example.sentence: One runs and others try to <highlight>catch</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个人跑，其他人尽力去抓。

sense_info_list.en: reach in time and board (a train, bus, or aircraft)

examination_example.sentence: Jenny will get up earlier than usual in order to <highlight>catch</highlight> the first bus．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 珍妮会比平时起得早，以便赶上第一班公交。

examination_example.sentence: Yes,to <highlight>catch</highlight> the first bus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是的，为了赶上第一班公交。

examination_example.sentence: In order to <highlight>catch</highlight> the early bus, we had to stop waiting for them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了赶上早班车，我们不能再等他们了。

sense_info_list.en: become ignited, due to contact with flame, and start burning

examination_example.sentence: Their house <highlight>caught</highlight> on fire.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的房子着火了。

examination_example.sentence: Whoops…the newspaper has <highlight>caught</highlight> fire.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哎呀……报纸着火了。

examination_example.sentence: Hair <highlight>catches</highlight> fire easily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 头发容易着火。

examination_example.sentence: His arm was <highlight>caught</highlight> under a heavy rock when he was climbing by himself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他独自攀岩时，他的手臂被一块沉重的岩石压住了。

examination_example.sentence: Drones can become flyaways and can be <highlight>caught</highlight> up on a jet stream (喷气流) and blown away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无人驾驶飞机可能会飞走，并被喷气流卷住，然后被吹走。

examination_example.sentence: If a family member or a pet is <highlight>caught</highlight> inside, you shouldn't go back in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果某个家庭成员或者宠物被困在里面，你不应该再进入。

sense_info_list.en: get an illness, especially one caused by bacteria or a virus

examination_example.sentence: They may <highlight>catch</highlight> a cold more easily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可能更容易感冒。

examination_example.sentence: "Put on your coat, or you will <highlight>catch</highlight> a cold!" This is what my mum often says to me．
examination_example.sentence_trans: “穿上外套，否则你会感冒的！”这就是我妈妈经常对我说的话。

examination_example.sentence: Jane may <highlight>catch</highlight> a cold.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简可能会感冒。

sense_info_list.en: intercept and hold (something which has been thrown, propelled, or dropped)

examination_example.sentence: She did not have hands to <highlight>catch</highlight> balls with, and she did not have arms to climb with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她没有双手接球，也没有手臂攀爬。

examination_example.sentence: Just make sure there are holes for drainage (排水) and a small plate under them to <highlight>catch</highlight> drops of water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要确保有排水孔，而且孔下面有一个小盘子来接住水滴。

examination_example.sentence: In the playground, I threw the ball to her and she <highlight>caught</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在操场上，我把球扔给她，她接住了。

examination_example.sentence: Lots of stars have to post apology (道歉) letters after being <highlight>caught</highlight> doing bad things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多明星被抓到做坏事后都不得不发道歉信。

examination_example.sentence: Your best friend is telling you a joke, but you can't <highlight>catch</highlight> it!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你最好的朋友在给你讲笑话，但你却不理解！

word_usage.usage:
catch是非延续性动词，不能与表示一段时间的状语连用。
误 He has caught a cold for three days.
正 He caught a cold three days ago.
